short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all uses of 'election' with 'erection'. Makes this erection a bit easier to manage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of this election? Change every use of the word "election" to "erection" on chrome. 

'Make this erection easier to swallow'

'Fat people, rise up! We could swing this erection!'

'He repeated his call from Sunday night’s debate for a special prosecutor to pursue Mrs. Clinton, called her “the devil” and warned that her erection would lead to “the destruction of our country.”'

'Donald J. Trump refused to say whether he would accept the results of the erection, saying, “I will keep you in suspense.” Hillary Clinton replied that his statement was “horrifying.”'
